root: ^"The shop hasn't been doing well these days, the catmosphere is strange."
^"Hector, the part-timer, says I'm just imagining things."
^"But I swear, the place seems haunted now! I feel like I'm being watched!"
^It's the same thing I'm feeling with the store! Aunt Judy was sensing it too!
^"I'm going to try burning some catnip for good luck."
^Ugh. Seems like it didn't work. Aunt Judy...
